actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-519, by Mr. Cardoza.

All points of order against such amendments are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Natural Resources now printed in the bill.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 182.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 940.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1528) to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the New England National Scenic Trail, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1528) to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the New England National Scenic Trail.

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1528) to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the New England National Scenic Trail, and for other purposes.
